Playing 3 Ouch cards in one turn means you become Unfortunately Sober (defeated). But don’t fret! Teammates are able to bring you back to the game with a Meaning of Life Card.

Alice in Shroomland – Spore Cultivation, has 2 game modes, cooperative and competitive. For either game mode your mission is simple… destroy the enemy leader. But beware! You can also win in competitive mode by wiping out the competition and being the last Player standing! Sabotage at its finest!

Players who feel like preserving peace will defend Shroomland and play as the Budz. Those looking to destroy Shroomland will play as the Dealerz. Playing as the Budz is an easier leveled game experience while playing as the Dealerz is meant for more avid gamers looking for a challenge. Take a trip on the wild side in Alice in Shroomland – Spore Cultivation!

223359.name: Weapons and Warriors: Castle Siege Game
223359.description:
This simple action game in the spirit of the Weapons and Warriors series has 2 castles (wall with drawbridge, 2 towers & keep) over which two players or teams (Red Army and Blue Army) fight. Also included are 4 Defense Shields, Combat Cannons, Power Catapults, 2 Crossbows, Battle Balls, and 2 Card Battlefields.

Castle Siege has quite a few more units overall than former games in the Weapons and Warriors series, adding new types including archers, knights, and battle tents while featuring 1 shield (instead of 4). The winning criteria in Siege is that all the knights/archers must be hit in addition to the General and the regular army units for a player to win.

223360.name: ¡Cobardes!
223360.description:
Meanwhile Village and Court are crying the King´s decease, his heirs, you are only thinking of gaining the Throne!

¡Cobardes! is a 2 player intuition game, fast and simple. Each coward Prince recruits Warriors, and in addition receives the support of a Villain and a Courtier in each Battle.

A Battle is fought in different and subsequent Combats. In each Combat two Warriors face each other. When one of them overcomes the other by 2 or more points of strength, he gains the Combat and grants the Victory in that Battle to his Prince.

The game and the Crown will befall the player who achieves Victory in three Battles or, even better, the one who beats the rival Prince on the battlefield.

223362.description:
The 13th expansion to the Legendary: A Marvel Deck Building Game puts the spotlight squarely on the X-Men. This set will bring to the game many of the X-Men characters that have been overlooked since the inception of the Legendary game.

This big box expansion has X-Men’s biggest heroes, including Psylocke and Banshee, battling their greatest foes. Even Beast makes a return as an all new X-Men team affiliated Hero!

This will be the biggest Legendary expansion to date with 394 cards of new Heroes, Masterminds, Villains, and Schemes straight from the X-Men comics!
223362.name: Legendary: X-Men

223363.name: Not My President: The Board Game
223363.description:
Description from the publisher:

What is Not My President?

I bet you’re asking yourself, what is this? Let me start off – I love games. I do. I do. Don’t let anyone tell you otherwise: nobody loves games more than me, and when it comes to games, I love them. I do. I’ve made plenty of games – I’ve provided more games to the American people than Obama ever will, ever has been, will go, games. And this one – it’s the greatest game of all time, mark my words. The best. Anyone that says different – we’re fighting a war here, ladies and gentlemen, a war, against fake news. If this game doesn’t get funded, we’ll know – it’s phony, America. This game is going to be huge. *Small loans of a million dollars are accepted and encouraged.

How It Works?

Based off the popular game Mafia, Not My President is a high-energy, 3-12 player game of deception that lasts 5-10 minutes per round. Using your best poker face, diversionary tactics, and a lot of finger pointing, the goal of Not My President is to either find the Trump Supporters amongst you, or, if you are one, to keep yourself hidden through any means necessary. Lying, spreading chaos, and blaming others are highly encouraged tactics. The game begins when players randomly select and privately view a “role card,” dividing the party into two groups: Trump Supporters and Reasonable People. Players then close their eyes for the election night. During this phase, the free app guides you through the special abilities of your assigned roles. Players secretly swap cards, change identities, and cause more mayhem than a private email server. When everyone has taken their turn, players open their eyes, and the accusations begin. After 5-10 minutes, players vote for who they believe to be the most likely Trump Supporter. If they’re wrong, the Trump Supporters win. If they’re right, it’s probably fake news, and the Reasonable People win.

Narration:

Because this game is so great and since we don't want anyone to feel left out of the party we have made a free downloadable app to narrate the game! Trust me its not Skynet, an extremely credible source told me so. Includes adjustable settings and soundtracks for those of you who like to spice things up a little.

223365.name: MyWorld
223365.description:
MyWorld is an action RPG adventure creator with built-in worlds; ready to be conquered and kick-start your imagination. Solid multi-player means you can battle alongside or against friends and foes with PvP and Co-Op modes. Invite players into adventures you've created, explore friends worlds and share on the steam workshop.

Source: The Developer Website.

223366.name: The Vulture GM's Critical Hit and Fumble Charts
223366.description:
Add more threat to combat!

From the introduction:

Critical hit and fumble charts add another layer of variability to combat encounters. A natural 1 or 20 goes from being merely a miss or double damage to an exciting escalation of danger. These universal charts maintain an inherent balance between playability and overarching threat, so don't be afraid to add them to your 5e game.

223367.name: Mech Defender
223367.description:
User Summary

Pilot a Mech to defend your home from zombies. MechDefender is a next chapter in Hero Tower Defense series. With Tower and Weapons and new tricky maps.

223368.name: Royal Blacksmith
223368.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.




Build your own royal Blacksmith. With blackjack and stuff.

Source: The Developer Website.

223369.name: Super Sports Surgery:  Rugby
223369.description:
User Summary

Surgery simulation game by Elite Games Ltd (I)

223370.name: Boss Monster: The Lost Levels
223370.description: This 5-card Boss Monster The Lost Levels mini-pack includes Boss Anererak, Monster Room: Wight House, Monster Room: Room 1-1, Monster Room: Shocksquid Pool, and Monster Room: Piranha Tank.

223371.name: Control Craft 3
223371.description:
User Summary

Command your troops to attack enemy control points. Utilize a wide range of troops and tactical abilities. During the heat of the battle, tactical decisions of when, where and how to attack will win or lose you the war.

48 Unique new levels.

223372.name: Merlins Lab
223372.description:
Merlins Lab is an puzzle game in which you try to find the philosopher's stone. The closer you to final aim, the more points you score.

Source: The Developer Website.

223373.name: Fly to the Moon!
223373.description:
One step at a time, your space program is taking off. Use the money earned from each launch to upgrade your rocket. Grab all the powerups and fuel you can while heading for the stratosphere. Avoid colliding with blimps, balloons and UFOs - they hurt! How fast can you get to the moon?

Source: The Developer Website.

223374.name: Regulator
223374.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.




"Regulator" - an action/platformer in the style of metroidvania. The player searches through an underground base for world's most dangerous terrorist leader, and its definitely not to reward him with candies and hugs.

Source: The Developer Website.

223375.name: Star Story: The Horizon Escape
223375.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.




"Star Story: The Horizon Escape" is an adventure game with survival elements and a choice-matter storyline in a sci-fi Wild West-esque world of the Horizon.

History

The archeological research mission faced some unexpected difficulties. Your spaceship crashed. You are sure you have to escape this planet. But how? No one can help you. You are here all alone. Or not? At least you know what you should do next...

Whew, stop.
Please tell us: aren't you tired of all these boring descriptive texts? We are! So here’s the deal: we show you the way to ease your eyes and mind, and you… Well, it’s up to you to decide!
"Star Story: The Horizon Escape" offers you a perfect way to relax in a sci-fi Wild West-esque world of the Horizon. Want to blow off some steam? Go kick some local monsters *cough* tails. Feel an urge to test your wits and luck? You will have tons of puzzles to solve and decisions to take. Like to make cool shiny things out of nothing? There you go. All the Horizon’s scrap is here for you. Or maybe you just want to meet new people and visit memorable places? You can find a few friends on the Horizon.

Source: The Developer Website.

223376.description:
Description from the publisher:

A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game lets players take control of their favorite Houses from the novels — represented by trays of high-quality, pre-assembled miniatures — and lead them into battle against their opponents. Players can recreate their favorite moments from the series or create their own stories. What if the Red Wedding never happened, and Robb Stark assaulted King's Landing? Now fans can find out!

Battles can range from large-scale wars with hundreds of miniatures to simple skirmishes between a few units without complicating the elegantly designed rules. The game features several unique systems, including alternating activations that keep the players engaged; a Rank System that changes a unit's capabilities as the battle rages on; a Tactics System that provides strategic powers fueled by a finite resource each round; and, most importantly, the iconic Heroes, such as Robb Stark and Jaime Lannister, that can change the course of war both on and off the battlefield.
223376.name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Stark vs Lannister Starter Set
boardgamefamily: A Song of Ice and Fire

223377.name: Aloha Paradise Hotel
223377.description:
Build your holiday paradise! Beach, sun and sea - vacation! Be a hotel manager and expand your hotel to be the most popular holiday destination.

»Aloha Paradise Hotel« for mobile devices is a F2P holiday resort building game based on the successful award winning browser game with a unique new set of features designed only for mobile devices.

Source: The Developer Website.

223378.name: Crush Online
223378.description:
Crush Online is a client-based MMO for PC with a strong focus on PVP battles featuring MOBA-style combat.

The world of Gaia is home to three realms, each populated by thousands of players fighting an endless territory war. These nations, along with a comprehensive guild system, are the groundwork for truly grand military clashes. Guilds and nations can ally with each other in exciting Castle Sieges to gain control of a nation and lord over its subjects, while entire nations may scheme with and against each other to win epic wars where not just glory, but also valuable treasure and powerful ability enhancements are at stake. Players can choose their avatars from a number of distinct, fully customizable classes, each with tons of different weapon setups and compete with other players and NPCs in tactical and challenging fights.

It’s not just a match – it’s war!

Source: The Publisher Website.

223379.name: Poopocalypse
223379.description:
User Summary

Cartoon platformer where you play a pigeon and you try to poop on as many things as you can.

223380.name: Knights of Valour
223380.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.




Experience side-scrolling, stage-based multiplayer action in Knights of Valour. Play with up to 3 friends at once in the fantastic 4-player online coop mode. Choose your favorite character with unique attributes that best suit your individual playstyle. Collect powerful equipment and learn new skills to enhance your characters' abilities.

PLAY IT FOR FREE!
Experience side-scrolling, stage-based multiplayer action in Knights of Valour. Play with up to 3 friends at once in the fantastic 4-player online coop mode. Choose your favorite character with unique attributes that best suit your individual playstyle. Collect powerful equipment and learn new skills to enhance your characters' abilities.

Source: The Game Website.

223381.name: Void Destroyer
223381.description:
In the outer edges of the Oort cloud, a Sun Gate links solar systems light years apart. The gate quickly becomes its own hub of activity as mining factions drag nearby asteroids into the gate's orbit. Hollowed asteroids become bases, homes to many. When riches are discovered, peace becomes cheap.With humble beginnings as a hobby project that began in May 2009 and a free prototype stage in January of 2011. The project has entered a commercial Early Access stage in January of 2014, and its initial release in January 2015.

What makes Void Destroyer unique:
I always enjoyed a great variety of games, I have combined many different ways of interacting with the game universe. Void Destroyer gives the player unique options on how to play. You can choose one or all of the options to suit your game style or the situation in game.

The ways of interacting with the game world and features:
- Fly any ship under your command - instantly change ships then directly pilot them. From drones to carriers, a huge variety of craft to pilot. This space sim uses a newtonian flight model designed to be have both enjoyable flight and combat in space.
- Command mode - become more of a commander and less of a pilot - intended for handling larger ships.
- Tactical mode - issue commands to ships via a real time strategy like interface. Tactical Mode is a fully 3D map, command console and your empire management tool.
- Control your bases production and economic output.
- Build platforms/stations for production and defense.
- Upgrade and repair your command ship. Where your in game Avatar resides and is able to remotely control your ships and assets. The command ship also features unique abilities to aid in combat.
- Experience the story line and unique setting.
- Battle Editor and Instant Action mode - an in game map editor to create custom maps and battle scenarios for you to enjoy quick or long battles and share them with friends.
- Research new technology.
- Crew control - your ships have crews, maybe you prefer them to do the flying for you.

Source: The Game Website.

223382.name: Void Destroyer 2
223382.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still in active development and available to the public for purchase in it's unfinished state, either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).




What is Void Destroyer 2?

Start with a ship, end with an empire.

Space sandbox set in a desolate asteroid field, Void Destroyer 2 emphasizes combat, tactics and strategy -- with battles ranging from one on one to fleets versus fleets. The game contains a simple, manageable yet engaging economy and offers loads of freedom to the player on how to play and who to play as. These are dangerous times with many opportunities for the intrepid, the cunning, and the ruthless.

Source: The Publisher Website.

223386.name: Blacksad: Pantalla del DJ
223386.description:
From the publisher blurb:

La pantalla del DJ de Blacksad: juego de rol es una ayuda indispensable para tus partidas en la ambientación de los cómics de Diaz Canales y Guarnido.

Sus características son:

* Tres paneles a todo color con un montaje de las ilustraciones de los cómics de Blacksad con una medida total de 835 x 218 mm.

* Tres paneles con las tablas más relevantes y resúmenes de reglas para facilitar tu trabajo como director en medio de la partida.

223387.name: Wiatyk
223387.description:
Author's blurb:

Wiatyk is a free role-playing game based on the first RPGs of the seventies.

During the game, players run a team of adventurers. They travel through a sinister land: beasts and undead are lurking in the woods, heretics and sorcerers are hiding in the settlements, and robbers and barbarians wander the trails. In spite of their fear, the player characters set out to escape mediocrity. They have to be ready for the expedition to take everything from them, but it's the only thing that gives them the chance to fulfill their dreams: whether it be power, wealth, knowledge or moral mission.

Wiatyk is an old-school game, supporting sandboxing and role-playing instead of playing scenarios and solving problems with dice. It draws on some of the valuable solutions that have been introduced in newer mainstream and independent gaming systems: skill mechanics rather than features; more flexible and fluid development of characters instead of division into levels and classes; it contains sample event generators and other aids for the GM; not getting experience points for treasure and defeating opponents; more emphasis is also placed on the dynamics of combat, rather than the detail; instead of statistics of magical items, monsters and spells, it makes it easier to create them as needed.

223388.name: Side Stitch
223388.description:
Side stitch is played on board tessellated with hexagonal cells and possessing an odd numbered of sides. The goal is to create a group of stones that touches more sides than your opponent.


Rules

On each turn, a player plays a single stone of his/her color to any empty cell; once placed, stones do not move. Play continues until the board is full or until both players pass in succession. The pie rule applies (that is, once the first stone is played, the second player can opt to switch colors with his/her opponent).

A group of same-color stones has a value equal to the number of sides it touches. (Note that a stone in the cell where two sides meet touches both of those sides). At the end of the game, each player identifies his/her highest-valued group. The player whose highest-valued group is highest is the winner. In case of tie, each player identifies his/her highest-valued group among the groups other than the two tied groups that were just compared; highest value wins. This process is repeated until the tie is broken. Draws are not possible.

boardgamedesigner: Naoyuki Matsuzawa (松澤 ナオユキ)
223389.name: DOSUKOI
223389.description:
User summary
DOSUKOI is a game based in the world of Sumo wrestling, using a game board, cards, and chips.

A player acts as the Oyakata of a Sumo-beya (the Master of a Sumo family/group - essentially a training school). The wrestlers must have good Chanko-Nabe from the kitchens (Chanko casseroles, a typical food for Sumo wrestlers). You must recruit new Rikishi (wrestlers), and they visit the Ozashiki (parlours) to gain support from Geisha and Oiran. Ultimately the wrestlers will gain victory at the Dohyo (Sumo ring) by pushing off the opponent, sometimes with support from Ninja actions.

This is a 2 player game of comparing numbers in three areas, the Dohyo, the Kitchen, and the Ozashiki. Each section gives you a different victory bonus which you can use further on. Play RIKISHI cards face-down from your hand against these sections, apply any extra actions (such as revealing cards or moving cards) and then compare strengths. The winner of the section advances their chip and this helps them further.

Winning in the Dohyo is crucial to victory, but without Kitchen and Ozashiki support, you would eventually fail there. Secure your strength, and aim for victory.

Publisher's summary
DOSUKOIは相撲を世界観にしたゲームとなっておりゲームボードとカード チップを使用したゲームになります。

世界観
プレイヤーは、相撲部屋の親方となり、台所で美味しいちゃんこを作り新しい力士をスカウトしたり、
お座敷に通い芸者や花魁の応援をもらいながら、時には忍者を暗躍させ、土俵で勝利し相手プレイヤーを押し出し最強を目指す。

このゲームは土俵と台所、お座敷というそれぞれ勝利ボーナスが違う3つの場所で、手札から出すRIKISHI達の数比べが基本的なシステムとなっております。

土俵で勝つとゲームの勝利に近づけますが、台所やお座敷で自身の相撲部屋を強くしないと負けます。うまく強くしながら、土俵での勝利を目指します。

223390.name: Amnesia: Awakening
223390.description:
From the introduction:

A group of people stir. Hazy vision clears, and they find themselves in a crater of charred earth scorched by fire. The issue is simple: they don’t know who they are. As they contemplate their identity, Orcs search the wreckage for survivors and quickly end their lives. The players must decide what to do swiftly, or face the spiny point of an Orc blade. Then to the greater issue; who are they, and what are they doing here?

223393.name: The Dark Hallway Quick Start Guide
223393.description:
From the introduction:

The ancient civilizations that lived in caves, often referred to as “cave men”, knew this, that all caves were interlinked into a vast underworld. When men started to build pyramids and ziggurats with cave-like tunnels, somehow, always, there was a door to this underground, no matter how hidden.

All major ground structures that intersect with the underground, whether through a passage, a basement, a dungeon, or sewer – all inevitably connect to the Hallway. The Hallway changes, expands, contracts - every time an earthquake shifts the foundations, construction of some great monument or tunnel system commences, and likewise, the Hallway incorporates it and becomes larger.

We have been to the furthest reaches of space, but not underground of our very planet Earth. Who knows what awaits us down there?

Civilizations may rise and fall, the Hallway will always be there until the end of Earth.

User summary:

The Dark Hallway is designed to be used on bulletin boards and forums.

223394.name: Valley of the Mist: Guidebook & Mission Files
223394.description:
From publisher blurb:

Based on the short story "Ukungu", Valley of the Mist is a guide to the remote region deep in the Congo Valley, where diamonds are plentiful and dinosaurs still roam free. It is for Airship Daedalus players and GMs who need a "lost world" setting for their campaign. It's packed with everything needed to get exploring!
Includes:

History and backstory of the region to whet the players' appetites
2 full color 11x17 maps of the valley (1 ancient, one 1920s modern) - full rez map files are included in addition to being presented in the book
12 fully statted NPCs
AEGIS encampment, 2 Silver Star encampments, diamond mine and typical Ape-Men enclave, maps included
Special rules for dinosaur mounts
4 mission briefings

223395.name: Hengen Kaitou J -Fantomu Daiya no Himitsu-
223395.description:
User summary
変幻怪盗J　～ファントムダイヤの秘密～ (Hengen Kaitou J -Fantomu Daiya no Himitsu-) in English is 'The Everchanging Phantom Thief J -Secret of the Phantom Diamond-'. The 怪盗 (Phantom Thief) theme is quite popular in Japan, from Arsene Lupin or Lupin the Third, or recently, Persona 5 from the Persona series in console games.

A card game with a phantom thief theme, the game has hidden role assignment. The cards are placed in a circle on the table, and the mission is to find the appropriate card in there. The Phantom Thief will win when the Heroine is found, or the Cops will win when they find the Phantom Thief.

To win, you must control the Squad card moving on the circle of cards, and execute the "charge in" card at the appropriate position.

Publisher's summary
テーマは怪盗。テーブルの中央に環状に伏せられたカードの中から、怪盗役は「ヒロイン」カードを、刑事役は「怪盗J」カードを探しあてれば勝利です。
勝利条件を満たすには、伏せられたカードの上を移動する「機動隊」カードをうまく制御して、目的のカードの上に「機動隊」カードが来た時に「突入」カードを使います。

223396.name: Espada Negra: Juego de Mesa – Edición Gunear
223396.description:
Expansion for Black Sword the table game that can also be used separately.
This edition incorporates a new element, the berserkers.

Expansión para Espada Negra el juego de mesa que se puede utilizar también por separado.
Esta edición incorpora un nuevo elemento, los berserkers.

223397.name: Rivals of the Mineans
223397.description:
From publisher blurb:

Explore the official world of Mazes & Minotaurs with this 18 page gazetteer detailing two of the most aggressive rivals of the Minean nations: - the ancient warlike kingdom of Umbria which guards the great western ocean - the island of Tritonis, last remnant of a once mighty sea empire Includes detailed background information, variant character classes and local NPCs.

223398.name: Uneasy Rests the Crown'd Head (5E)
223398.description:
From publisher blurb:

A 5th Edition Mini-Dungeon for 4-6 PCs of levels 7-8

A sinkhole, cut with climb-holds, descends a cramped cavern’s south wall, slick with more than water. A 3-ft.-wide path rings a black, light-absorbing lake. 20-ft. north of the path, a stone circle containing a clear membrane floats above the water. A path leaves the cavern in the north wall, a crack in the ceiling drips water. The lake houses an aboleth sanctuary, the start of a new city.

223399.name: Chrome Devils of the Swamp (5E)
223399.description:
From publisher blurb:

A 5th Edition Mini-Dungeon for 4 PCs of level 6

The tale of the fi ery comet crash and the haunting of the swamp is known. But now the bog waters are mysteriously drying out, the swampland thinning, and rumours surfaced of devils the comet unleashed. Only the bravest or the foolhardy would dare investigate. But will they be prepared to go against the Chrome Devils of the Swamp?

223400.name: The Siren's Lament (5E)
223400.description:
From publisher blurb:

A 5th Edition Mini-Dungeon for 4-5 PCs of Level 4

Sirens rarely find true love, but the one haunting this watery memorial managed the trick. Unfortunately her father, a powerful spirit called the Sea King, disapproved of the match. He conjured a storm to sink her lover’s ship, not realizing the depths of his daughter’s attachment. The siren’s suicide drove the Sea King build these winding passages in a fit of remorse. They are a monument to the love that he destroyed, and a home for his daughter’s anguished spirit.

223401.name: Chasing a Golden Buck (Fudge)
223401.description:
From publisher blurb:

Steal an idol from a cult full of healing, tree-hugging nature-worshipers only armed with quarterstaff? Should be an easy heist.

Chasing a Golden Buck is a fantasy scenario designed as the first or second adventure for a party of 4-6 characters. The scenario includes multiple plot hooks that can be used far beyond the single adventure as the basis for an entire campaign.

Includes:

A breakdown of the cult, including multiple options as to its nature and operations.
While geared towards gritty Sword-And-Sorcerery campaign, it is easily modified to any Fantasy setting or campaign.
Maps of the compound and three buildings.
A city section map.
6 pre-built characters with full backgrounds and full-color illustrations.
5" x 8" format perfect for tablets.
On laptops with wide screens, display in 2-up/2-Page with Show Cover Page in Two Page View selected.
Some secret info you'll find out about when you purchase!
Uses Five Point Fudge™ as detailed in Fudge™ 10th Anniversary Edition.
New extra-crunch option for Five Point Fudge™ if you want to play with a slighlty more old-school feel to combat while otherwise running the game using standard Fudge™ (requires a few standard six-sided dice in addition to Fudge™ dice.)

223402.name: Mutant Manual
223402.description:
From publisher blurb:

Anyone could be a mutant.

Your neighbor, sibling, co-worker. Anyone. They might not even know themselves until they start sprouting extra eyes, tentacles, or fangs.

Sometimes they look just like everybody else.

Sometimes only the brain mutates, resulting in strange cravings, urges, and behaviors. Human on the outside, they might feel compelled to kill, drink blood, or build coccoons. Is that guy down the block really going out at night to bowl? Or is he on a quest to devour fresh brains?

For that matter, what's up with those headaches you've been having? Those achey muscles? And is that a "normal" rash or an indicator of something more sinister?

Anyone could be a mutant.

Even you.

Mutant Manual is a suppliment for creating mutant characters (including player characters with GM approval). Appropriate for any modern-era campaign, Mutant Manual contains:

Over 120 mutant traits, both advantageous and detrimental.
Statistics for 56 mutant archetypes and mutant animals.
Statistics and history of 12 qnique mutants.
20+ New, mutant-specific Edges, Feats, Stunts, Qualities, and power modifiers.

223403.name: Welcome to Bremen
rpgseries: R.E.A.C.T.: Research, Engineering, And Crisis Team
223403.description:
From publisher blurb:

Someone or some thing has been stalking the abandoned alleyways of a small town, leaving behind mangled bodies drained of blood. Is the killer a vampire, hungry ghost, legendary skunk-ape, or run-of-the-mill psychopath?

Welcome to Bremen, home of Wes Anderson's famous zoo, the state's best blueberry pie, and the most urban legends per capita in the country. Ever since the mill closed up, folks haven't had much to do but sit around and swap stories. The streets would be empty if they weren't full of ghost stories, urban legends and... bodies.

Designed to work in any modern setting (with notes for adapting for fantasy worlds and hardcore science fiction) the 10+ plot expansion ideas make it a perfect campaign starter or a stand-alone adventure.

Portions of this adventure have previously been published as the R.E.A.C.T. Sample Adventure.

223404.description:
1947 is a game inspired by 18XX Series on Indian Railroads after the Independence.

This 18XX game introduces some new mechanics:
- warrant release, to finance your companies
- saving shares
- emigrations
- temples to reach with your routes for travelling pilgrims
- seasonal climate (monsoon, dry, fertile, intermediate)

223405.name: Color Code
223405.description:
User summary
'Color Code is a Karuta-like card game. Someone reads the hexadecimal RGB color-code (the kind that is used in web pages), and players aim to be the first to grab the corresponding color card.

In Japan, there is a a 400-year-old card game for two players, named Hyakunin Isshu (100 Poems by 100 Poets) (Wikipedia: Karuta), for example "Iroha Karuta", or Ogoola Karuta: 50 English Classics. Two players kneel on the floor opposite each other, with cards arranged in front of them. On each card are small pieces of text from classic poetry, and typically with a small illustration.

A separate Reader chooses from a random deck and sings a phrase out loudly. The players must search to find the matching couplet on their cards and either grab or block the appropriate card. Whoever snatches the most cards wins. Play is very swift and physically as well as mentally demanding.

This game, Color Code, is basically the same. The difference is that there are no illustrations on the played cards, but instead a single color is printed on them. The Reader doesn't read a phrase, but calls out an HTML color-code, like #FFFFFF or #FF0000. When the Reader calls a code, the players must know which color it is and make their play. So if the Reader calls "#FF0000", players must grab the red card.

Publisher's summary
WEBページの色を指定する１６進数のRGBカラーコードを読み上げ、該当する色カードをとる速度を競う、かるた風カードゲームです。

223406.description: An extra deck of automa cards for playing solo against multiple opponents. This set of cards is the same as the automa deck that can be found in the base game. It can be ordered separately from various sources to play against multiple automated factions at once. Rules to do so, either competitively or cooperatively, can be found here.
223406.name: Scythe: Automa Deck

223408.name: Mind Benders
223408.description:
Box front
Games to puzzle & intrigue


User summary
A compilation of four mind bending games; mainly puzzle or trivia styled games with an action scrolling shooter game as well.

Manual comes in seven different languages:
English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, and Danish.

As well as an

rpg: Metal Rogue: Tales of the Radiant Fire Heart
223409.name: Metal Rogue: Tales of the Radiant Fire Heart Demo Version
223409.description:
From the introduction:

Sometimes a hero wants an adventure, but they just want a little bit of it.

Maybe you want to make sure it's the right kind of adventure.

User summary:

The game uses an unusually high degree of randomization.

223410.name: Leader Board Par 3
223410.description:
From cassettte inlay
Par 3 - A classic compilation of the greatest series of golf simulations ever produced, featuring - Leaderboard, Leaderboard Tunrnament & World Class Leaderboard.
Par 3 offers no fewer than twelve courses to test even the most avid golfer to the limit!

"The best golf simulators of all times and all three of 'em for this price!" SUNCLAIR USER
"The ultimative golf compilation!" CRASH 93%

223411.name: American 3D Pool
223411.description:
Cassette cover

Cue up for the latest Three Dimensional Pool, Billiards and Trick Shot simulation on your C64.

Packed with outstanding features like slow motion action replay and three camera angles, the game brings a whole new perspective to computer Pool.

The special Trick Shot Editor allows you to hone yur skills to those of a real Pool Hall Hustler.

Whether playing against EIGHT friends in a League Tournament, or pitting your wits against a sharp computer opponent, American 3D Pool is the most enternatingly accurate Pool and Billiards simulator.

223412.name: Atari Climber
223412.description:
User Summary

Climber 5 is a port by Dennis Debro of an Atari 8-bit computer game (Atari Climber or just Climber) that originally appeared in COMPUTE! magazine back in 1987. In the Original game mode, play closely mimics the original Atari 8-bit version.

You've lost your baseball on a tall building and have to climb up to retrieve it while avoiding moving beams.

223413.name: Death Rattle, Panegyric and Epitaph
223413.description:
From the introduction:

Death Rattle, Panegyric and Epitaph is a roleplaying game about death. One of the players will take the seat of the Death Master, and all the other players will take on a player character who has recently lost an acquaintance. Maybe a friend, maybe a familiar, maybe someone from the office.

That person is the same for all the player characters, a shared bond between them. And all the player characters have received a message from the dead person, begging every one of them to find out who murdered him or her, and why. The dead acquaintance is the Player Ghost, and is controlled and defined between all players.

223414.name: The Exploits of Fingers Malone
223414.description:
From game inlay

15 levels of sheer thrill-power! Be nimble and be quick for it is up to you to collect all the money stolen in the recent bank raids. However you will not be alone - the raiders themselves are onto you and they will try anything to stop you from uncovering their swag!

223415.name: Raptor
223415.description:
From publisher blurb:

A Man without a Past!

The earliest memory "Gabe" has is of violence and survival in the Sacred Lands – an isolated region on Earth concealed within a dimensional fold where dinosaurs still roam. Gabe could stalk, kill, heal with great speed, and he neither knew nor cared why. But when Donovan Shepherd came to the Sacred Lands and told Gabe he was a Meta, a human born with extraordinary abilities, Gabe began to wonder how he came to live in such a savage place. He returned with Donovan to the outer world, teaching at Donovan's school for Metas, and fighting alongside the heroic Vindicators as the Raptor (PL 9). Still, he wonders about his past.

Iconic Legends. Because sometimes you a need a character everyone knows, even if they're meeting them for the first time.

223416.name: Inkosi
223416.description:
From publisher blurb:

Inkosi is KING

In 1933, a movie producer led an expedition to the Sacred Lands to film the strange primeval creatures that dwelt in that dimension. While there, he captured a giant gorilla-like monster named Inkosi (PL 10), and taken to New York. Inkosi escaped his chains and spent the better part of a day tearing through the streets of Manhattan until it was killed by the military.

Super Powered Legends. Because sometimes what you need is a character everyone will recognize, even if they’ve never met her before.

223417.name: The House Mix
223417.description:
User Summary
A collection of Gremlin's games in their own "house mix". The games are on two tapes:
Tape 1 contains
- Skate Crazy
- Techno Cop

Tape 2
- Dark Fusion
- Night Raider
- Artura
- Motor Massacre

223418.name: Passengers: Awakening VR Experience
223418.description:
Awaken on the Starship Avalon as it hurdles past Mars towards the Homestead Colony. You quickly realize that there are critical malfunctions onboard and fellow passenger Jim Preston needs your help to fix them.

Source: The Game Website.

223419.name: Blue-Collar Astronaut
223419.description:
Arcade space-physics meets your student loans. Blue-Collar Astronaut literally and figuratively explores upwards mobility on your way to the All-American Space-Dream.

Source: The Game Website.

223420.name: Rally Cross Challenge
223420.description:
From Commodore 64 box

A fast and powerful car seeks an adventurous driver of cool courage to accept the challenge of highly alented and experienced computer drivers on six treacherous tracks of Rally Cross. Powerful car enhancements available for proven track record. Maximum of two applicants considered.


From Atari ST box

A fast and powerful car seeks an adventurous driver of cool courage to accept the challenge of highly alented and experienced computer drivers on six treacherous tracks of Rally Cross. Powerful car enhancements available for proven track record. Maximum of four applicants considered.

223421.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – Scurrg H-6 Bomber Expansion Pack
223421.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Scurrg H-6 Bomber was crafted with combat versatility in mind. It was armed with powerful shields and a bristling array of destructive weaponry, and one of its prototypes was infamously stolen by Captain Nym. You’ll find not one, but two different ship cards for this notorious pirate in the Scurrg H-6 Bomber Expansion Pack for X-Wing, allowing you to fly him with the Rebellion or the galaxy’s Scum and Villainy. Additionally, the expansion’s pre-painted, small-base miniature starship is accompanied by three other ship cards, plus a hefty complement of ten upgrades laden with ordnance.

223422.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – TIE Aggressor Expansion Pack
223422.description:
Description from the publisher:

The TIE aggressor was designed for long missions, supply chain raids, and tactical flexibility, and in X-Wing, it can lend a great deal of tactical flexibility to your Imperial fleet. Much of this versatility comes through the ship's ability to equip a turret weapon and a pair of missiles. Altogether, the TIE Aggressor Expansion Pack pairs its pre-painted miniature starfighter with four ship cards and five upgrades, plus everything else you need to fly the ship to battle.

223423.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – Auzituck Gunship Expansion Pack
223423.description:
Description from the publisher:

Designed by Appazanna Engineering Works of Kashyyyk and equipped with three wide-range Sureggi twin laser cannons, the Auzituck gunship was known for its impressive firepower and incredible durability. The Auzituck Gunship Expansion Pack brings this ship to X-Wing as a resilient, pre-painted, small-base Rebel starship with three attack, one agility, and six hull protected by three shields and the reinforce action. You’ll find even more ammunition and defensive options among the expansion’s four ship cards and six upgrades.

223424.name: Prohibition
223424.description:
Prohibition is a worker placement and area control game for 2-4 players, aged 12 and up, and takes 75 to 120 minutes to play.

In it, you are the leader of a Gang at the dawn of Prohibition, competing to gain Prestige through amassing wealth, expanding your Turf, and completing devious Schemes.

To be successful, you must set up bootlegging operations, collect Extortion, and recruit Goons. You can play nice, or you can Order your Goons to Attack other Gangs, Steal their resources, and Torch their Buildings.

However, everything you do generates Heat. The more you have, the more often, and more severely, the Feds will disrupt your operations and flummox your plans. You can try to Lay Low, or you can spend your hard earned Gs to generate Goodwill or Bribe the Feds to look the other way.

Whether you are someone who loves running an economy, managing resources, or engaging in conflict, thanks to 45 different Scheme Cards providing different strategic objectives, Prohibition offers new challenges and fun every time you play.

223425.name: Four Corners
223425.description: Four Corners is a casual abstract game for two to four players. Be the first player to collect rings from all four corners of the board and return home in the center of the board. But you can only move in the directions the die roll allows. Four Corners is a race against your opponents that is suitable for the entire family.

223426.name: Transylvanian Tower
223426.description:
Cassette inlay
A spine chilling adventure with spectacular 3-D graphics. Can you rid the world of this Transylvanian Terror before he introduces you to the dark world of the Living Dead?

223427.name: Luther: Das Kartenspiel
223427.description:
Description from the publisher:

We are in the 16th century, after the death of Martin Luther, the world-changing Augustinian friar. Most of his discouraged followers and admirers are still asking each other hopelessly: how to go on without him? What’s next now?

Some of them, however, know very well what is to be done in times like this: to write down the events of the reformer’s earthly journey as detailed and as true as possible. This is the only way to pay due tribute to their friend and professor in order to educate the world and the church. So, they organize themselves into a handful of scriveners and set to writing the great biography. But they might get hard pressed for time!

While playing Luther – Das Kartenspiel we have the chance to slip into the shoes of these scribes. The teamwork, as usually happens, swings into a little rivalry: who will reap the glory, which comes with chronicling certain stages of life? Who will be the one taking the most manuscripts to the printing house? What’s more, from time to time, the diligent work of the scribes is interrupted by the least expected incidents such as: a carefully inscribed sheet of paper burns or changes hands “accidently”, or a crafty fellow scribe filches a page, or mixes foolish rumours into the reliable notes.

223428.name: Stellar Monarch
223428.description:
Stellar Monarch is a space empire builder (4X, space empire builder, for PC) with focus on:
1) You being the Emperor (audiences, edicts, imperial court, assassins)
2) No micromanagement (you don’t deal with low level stuff)
3) Asymmetric gameplay (computer plays by different rules, different starting conditions, different goals, etc)

Formerly known as Pocket Space Empire when the game was in Early Access.

Source: The Developer Website.

223429.name: Revealations
223429.description:
Description from the designer:

Revealations is an easy to play party board game which tests your knowledge of Movie, TV show and Song titles in a fun and unique way. The titles have to be guessed by seeing only the initial letters of titles printed on the various category card decks.

Revealations has simple rules, is quick to set up and the game play involves a race to the top of the game board. Players earn points depending on how many initial letters are revealed before the player can guess the title. The game combines knowledge of Movie, TV and Song titles with a hint of anagram/code breaking skills.

223430.name: Alien Insanity
223430.description:
User Summary

24 mind-bending levels of alien killing action. Can you kill the aliens and find the exit. Game includes a level editor.

223433.name: Snakes and Ladders 3D
223433.description:
User Summary

Classic 3D take on the famous board game. Reach the top and avoid the snakes.

223434.name: Knotty
223434.description:
User Summary

Untie the knots as fast as you can in this puzzle game.

223435.name: The Black Badge of the Galaxy
223435.description:
The Black Badge of the Galaxy is a wargame in which each player puts himself in the shoes of a commander sent to one of the thousands of solar systems at war to consolidate the power of his species in him. Tercants, Humans, Hormínids, Talians and Aknumis will fight to the devastation and the death by winning the one that is the greater war in the galaxy in centuries. The war that will forever change the history of and the becoming of all the races of the galaxy.

Conquest, economic and social development, and strategic vision will be fundamental to victory. Who will win? Who knows. What is certain is that everyone will return home with the black badge of the galaxy in their memories.


Es un juego de guerra en el que cada jugador se pone en la piel de un comandante enviado a uno de los miles de sistemas solares en guerra para consolidar el poder de su especie en él. Tercantes, humanos, hormínids, talians and aknumians lucharán hasta la devastación y la muerte por ganar la que es la mayor guerra en la galaxia en siglos. La guerra que cambiará para siempre la Historia de y el devenir de todas las razas de la galaxia.

La conquista, el desarrollo económico y social, y la visión estratégica serán fundamentales para lograr la victoria. ¿Quién ganará? Quién sabe. Lo que es seguro es que todos volverán a casa con la negra badge de la galaxia en sus memorias.

223436.description:
Prolific designer Brian Train (The Scheldt Campaign) has created a number of games on unusual, under-gamed topics, often utilizing unique and innovative mechanisms. Hollandspiele is proud to be bringing two of Mr. Train's most interesting designs to your table in a single box.

Ukrainian Crisis simulates the Russian intervention in the Ukraine beginning in 2014. Diplomacy, propaganda, and international prestige play just as big a part in the proceedings as military force, if not more-so: it's entirely possible for the situation never to result in armed conflict at all. Each of these various elements feeds into and off of the others, resulting in a complex and decision-rich strategic situation. Event cards provide opportunities to turn things to your advantage, or to collapse in folly. The game is driven by the allotment of Resource Points chits. These chits are divided into three categories that each provide a random range of Resource Points: Minimum (1-4), Medium (2-5), and Maximum (2-12, trending toward 7). Each player has a finite number of each type of chit. This not only means that the commitment of chits among different activities within a given turn is important, but that as the game progresses, the choices you made on previous turns limits the range of options available for the end-game. While the decisions are rich and nuanced, the game system is relatively straightforward, making it a great introduction into "pol-mil" gaming.

The Little War is a smaller game about a smaller conflict: the week-long 1939 border war between Hungary and Slovakia. This is more of a straight-forward military engagement, but that doesn't mean it's any less interesting, clever, or innovative. The Little War is driven by an ordinary deck of playing cards (which you'll have to provide yourself). On each turn, six cards are drawn from the deck. One player gets the Hearts (movement) and Diamonds (combat), the other the Spades (movement) and Clubs (combat). The luck of this draw might favor one player this turn, but this will result in it being more likely to favor his opponent on the next.

Together, these two games provide hours of entertainment for adventurous gamers.
223436.name: Ukrainian Crisis & The Little War

223437.name: Ars Gladiatoria: The Duel
223437.description:
From the introduction:

Ars Gladiatoria - The Duel is a fast narration and strategy game, designed to be read while playing.

User summary:

This light-weight version of the game is typically distributed in a ZIP archive including nine two-page PDF files which are intended for print-and-play use. Characters are pre-generated and the narrative focuses almost exclusively on arena combat.

223441.name: Arvingerne: En Total Fiasko!
223441.description:
From the introduction:

A random afternoon in October 2014 while the weather considered whether to drizzle or just blow cold. Otto Gregers Bisted, 82 years old - died alone in his manor on Funen.

Tingby and Poulsen, barrister and solicitor of the High Court, call for possible heirs in the local press but do not expect any claimants to the will of the old oddball.

Everyone had forgotten uncle Otto. He had lived so long, so alone there. The cousins had not seen each other since the incident...

223442.name: A Stop on the Road
223442.description:
From the introduction:

A short adventure for 3-5 players of level 1-3.

The hamlet of Cartrest has grown up around the Wearied Wagon Inn beside a main road. Recently locals have seen strange lights around a set of ancient ruins nearby. Driven by a mix of fearful superstition and curiosity the locals have scraped together a small reward to encourage someone to investigate.

223443.name: Mighty Protectors Pre-Release Edition
223443.description:
From the introduction:

This is a pre-release version of the upcoming 3rd Edition rules. The layout isn’t final, there are no illustrations, and the world background section is incomplete.

Pre-Release Edition 2.9 - March 2017

User summary:

This pre-release PDF version of the game was distributed only to project backers, with a solicitation for feedback.

223444.name: Clone Drone in the Danger Zone
223444.description:
Congratulations human! After we dispose of your body we will put your mind inside a sword fighting robot!

Source: The Game Website.

223445.name: Double Breakout
223445.description:
Double Breakout is a breakout game for one or two players combining game mechanics from a traditional breakout game and a pong game.

Source: The Publisher Website.

223446.name: Danganronpa 1-2 Reload
223446.description:
User Summary

Danganronpa 1 and 2 in one package.

223448.name: Crawling All Over III
223448.description:
This scenario is designed for six players and can be played in five to six hours.

The story transpires in a cliché-heavy Alien-style setting with several underlying conflicts. When in doubt, think of the films in the Alien franchise or The Thing, etc., and you won't go wrong.

The many sinister aliens, and the accompanying violence and tension, are only meant as framing for a story where the core conflicts are those that arise between the characters.

User summary:

This version of the scenario is a "recreation" of an earlier version titled "Crawling All Over II" from 1992. It is available as a PDF conversion of an HTML document.

223449.name: Konja
223449.description:
Description from the publisher:

Konja is a press-your-luck and resource management dice and card game in which players compete as wizards summoned by the old King to manifest great storms and bring rain to the dry land. By rolling dice and activating powerful spells and relics cards, players gain gold, magick, power, and storm tokens.

Konja is played over a series of rounds; in each round, each player completes their turn before play proceeds to the next player clockwise. On their turn, a player first selects from the available traveller cards, which grant that player a bonus action and all players a special action. If all traveller cards have been taken, all traveller cards are returned to center of the table and become available. Second, the player rolls their dice, then through manipulation of cards and tokens, spends the dice combinations formed to gain further tokens:


High numbers reward power tokens, which are used to manipulate dice via relic cards.
Pairs reward magick tokens, which activate spell cards in hand.
Runs reward gold tokens, which are spent to purchase relic cards and storms.
Three or more of a kind grants storm tokens, which are worth victory points (VP).


The first player to accumulate 30 VP is declared Grand Wizard and the winner of the game.

223450.name: Liberators
223450.description:
User Summary

Browser based World War II game where you are the Americans and take on the Nazi Germans in battle.

223451.name: Trivia Crack
223451.description:
Trivia Crack (original Spanish name: Preguntados) is a mobile app that allows users to compete against friends and people around the world. Modeled after popular games such as Trivial Pursuit, it became the most downloaded game in December 2014 from the Apple App store.[1] The game initially launched on October 26, 2013, specifically to Latin America and was later translated into English.[2]

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trivia_Crack Trivia Crack]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

223452.name: Trivia Crack Kingdoms
223452.description:
The amazing quiz game that lets you test your knowledge and challenge your friends to see who is the smartest

Source: The Game Website.

223453.description: A pack of an additional 10 'Perk' and 10 'Quirk' cards for mixing into the decks of the base Billionaire Banshee game. All 20 cards are in the 'Sexy' category.
223453.name: Billionaire Banshee: Sexy Foil Pack

223454.name: Corona de Hierro
223454.description:
In Corona de Hierro (Iron crown), each player represents an Italian noble in the 9th century, that will try to increase their power before the imminent death of King Carlos III, last of the Carolingian dynasty. To do this, he must send emissaries to negotiate with other nobles, with the Pope and with the barbarians, mobilize armies, besiege castles and win battles. The most powerful player at the time of the coronation (but not necessarily the new king) will be the winner of the match.

In this game, players take turn to take two actions among moving their armies in a map, besieging neutral/opponent castles to earn power and get prisoners, attach adjacent armies, send emissaries to pope and barbarians also to increase the power or draw cards that have various effects, mainly improving the other actions.
Each player has a secret objective that can give a bonus: To make another player (or perhaps himself) king.
At the end of the game, triggered when a player gets the crown, the noble with more points is the winner.

223455.name: Terra-017
223455.description:
The remnants of the human race are traveling from planet to planet, searching for food and resources. As one of the Faction Leaders, you'll guide your people to colonize Earth-017. Manage your resources, employ your workers, exploit what the planet has to offer to the fullest in this hexagon game of sci-fi civilization. But remember: the planet is far from deserted!

Terra-017 is a strategic game of hexagon placement, that will let you build colonies on a planet while repelling the alien resistance. Since the first moments you'll realize that the game recalls classics like StarCraft and that it will let you see your colonies grow and develop before your eyes, all illustrated by the excellent art of Valeria Rossi. It's a game in which the ability to plan long term and to react to unexpected player moves or events have equal weight. The hexes represent various buildings you can build and there is a limited number of them, so you'll have to choose an effective strategy to take hold of them and at the same time work towards the objectives that will net you points at the end of each of the three in-game years. Some hexes will give you resources to build, while others will have special abilities, usually activated with your workers. There is going to be a constant struggle with the other players to build the best colony, but pay attention to the annual alien attack, that could do some serious damage to your colonies if you don't prepare in time!
Each year is also divided in the four seasons, each with its own deck of events that will influence the game, forcing you to adapt. Knowing when to build, recruiting new workers or activating special abilities is the key to success.

223456.description:
The Pursuit of Happiness: Community expansion introduces players to their local community. It comes with a new Community board which provides space for the cards of the new Community Deck, and also features a Popularity track. Through this expansion, players have the chance to engage in various community related events and choose their outcome, affecting their popularity within the community.

The expansion also comes with new Projects, Items, Activities, Jobs, Partners as well as material for a 5th player.
223456.name: The Pursuit of Happiness: Community
boardgamepodcastepisode: 30. Devon Dice podcast: Not Too Busy To Play Games

223457.name: XOBrainer
223457.description:
XOBrainer is advanced type of 5-in-a-row, that can be played by 2 persons or 2 teams, where the object of the game is to get 5-in-a-row in either shape (X’s or O’s) or colour (green or red).

It sounds simple, but you have to think two-dimensionally and use, not only your own pieces, but also your opponent’s pieces to get 5-in-a-row.
Player/team X has the X’s; 24 X’s are green and 8 X’s are pink. Player/team O has the O’s; 24 O’s are pink and 8 O's are green.
Each player/team then places 4 of his/her pieces in the line-up area – 3 of his/her own main colour and 1 in the opponent’s main colour. For instance; Player X would place 3 green X’s and 1 pink. Each player will then play the pieces from the line-up area, (numbered 1-4) when it is empty the players fill it with 4 new pieces in the same colour order as before.
This way each player will have to place every 4th piece in the opponent’s main colour – this piece can benefit both players – one can benefit from the shape and the other can use the colour to his/her advantage.
When you achieve 5-in-a-row you earn a number of points based on the placement of the row on the game board. In each square there are dots, like on a dice, that indicates how many points you get from that square. When a player reaches 20 points, he/she wins a set. The game is won, when a player has won 3 sets, with one exception; regardless of point/set score the game can be won instantly by Knock Out. On the game board there are 4 special squares – these are marked with at large dot. To win by Knock Out, a player/team has to achieve 5-in-a-row that passes through a Knock Out square. You may only place pieces that both players/teams can benefit from, in the Knock Out Squares (red x’s, green o’s).
The game comes with 4 game variations that can be added and combined freely;

- Random; instead of playing with the standard colour order, play with randomly selected pieces, either by drawing 4 pieces randomly from the X- or O-bags or use our free WebApp

- Map; Start the game from at new starting point; each player/team draws a card and places 4 pieces as depicted on the card – this way there is a new starting point in each round

- TimeBomb; set a time limit for each move with our free WebApp.

- Mission; using the Map/mission cards each player has a secret mission – to place pieces as depicted on the card. Each piece a player succeeds in placing gives the player extra points (if he also achieves 5-in-a-row)

223458.name: Craft the World - Sisters in Arms
223458.description:
User Summary

First expansion for Craft the World, adds the female dwarves and pets as well as new equipment, special items, decor, and creatures with new abilities.

223459.name: The Rifter (Issue 70 - Apr 2015)
rpgissuearticle: Clean, Part Two – A story for Rifts®
From the Desk of Kevin Siembieda
223459.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Rifter #70 is about magic, monsters, and strange people and places. There is the Frost Mage and 60+ cold-based spells (all official source material), the Splicers Technojacker explored in-depth revealing many new powers and abilities (official source material), the City of New Strawn, Kansas, on Rifts Earth, monsters from the Rifts in The Unbidden, watery depths to explore, and adventure to resolve in the ‘Burbs. Plus news, conventions and coming attractions.

The Rifter Number 70 includes:

Splicers – Blood and Iron – “official” source material by Brandon Aten. The Technojacker revisited and expanded. New powers and gear.
Rifts, Palladium Fantasy RPG, & Other Settings – “official” source material by Nate Bingham and Kevin Siembieda. The Frost Mage O.C.C., the Time of a Thousand Magicks, and 60+ “official” Frost spells.
Rifts, Minion War and Three Galaxies – “official” source material by Josh Sinsapaugh and Kevin Siembieda. Three new transdimensional terrors – The Unbidden™ – slip through the dimensional bleed to create havoc.
Rifts – New Strawn, by Travis Legge. An independent city-state in Rifts Kansas.
Rifts – Deep Frontier, by Mark Temple. Explore the unseen depths of the oceans and waterways of Rifts Earth.
Rifts – Clean, Part Two, a short story by Irvin Jackson. Adventure, betrayal and intrigue in the Chi-Town ‘Burbs reaches its conclusion.
Tips for Game Masters by Chris Isberg.
News, coming attractions, product descriptions and more.
96 pages of fun and adventure in the Palladium Megaverse.

223460.name: Possessed Construct
223460.description:
From publisher blurb:

Each release for Crawthorne's Catalog of Creatures for the Pathfinder RPG presents a single, new creature for your Pathfinder RPG game, as presented by the famous and retired monster hunter and adventurer, Lord Crawthorne. Each release presents game stats for the new creature, as well as three adventure ideas to help insert them into your game.

The Possessed Construct is the result of a powerful spell that puts the mind of a living being into a construct's body. The outcome may be eternal life, but it is one cut off from much of the senses the living take for granted. How long can a mind last in such a state before it becomes detached from its feelings and empathy?

223461.name: Hobcastle Ruins - Orc Fort
223461.description:
From publisher blurb:

It didn't take long for Hobcastle Ruins to get a new set of owners. After it fell in a siege and was abandoned, it wasn't long before travellers reported campfires burning in the ruins at night, and sound of hammering and construction during the day. It has now become the stronghold of the Ullfrag'uk tribe of orcs.

Hobcastle Ruins - Orc Fort is a printable battemap compatible with any RPG game. It can be used as a standalone gameboard, or combined with any same-scale tileset.

Hobcastle Ruins is a day & night set, comprising of 2 30x30 battlemaps. The daytime map features the ruins of a castle that have been turned into an orc camp. Palisade fences, decorated with skulls, have been built to block the gaps in the wall, and the courtyard is filled with tents, fires and rubbish. The chieftain has taken over the remains of a small hall within the castle, whilst her minions make camp in the open air. The other version depicts the castle at night, with more torches and braziers lit to prevent sneak attacks.

223462.name: Mazes & Perils Holiday Special 2016 (5E)
223462.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Celebration of Sinterklaas is in danger! What has become of the good people of Wollemi?

When the forces of nature take hold of the land, sometimes it’s all you can do to outlast the storm, but when all contact is lost with the nearby village of Wollemi, their sister town of Dunwick gets worried and asks the heroes to check it out. They must take a dangerous path up into the mountains to not only see if they’re ok, but deliver presents to the children for the Celebration of Sinterklaas, a yearly festival that brings their communities together…

The Mazes & Perils Holiday Special 2016 is a short adventure designed for 4-6 5e characters of 2nd or 3rd level, but it can easily be adjusted for use with any edition of your favorite fantasy RPG.

This module introduces:

New monsters with stats and descriptions for use in 5e! Ice elementals! Klaasi (Snow Kobolds)! The Snow Witch!
The town of Dunwick and its sister village of Wollemi – including the low-down on important NPCs, trade in the area, and more!
Descriptions for a new class of weapon — Firebrand weapons!




The Holiday Special 2016 also features a full 8.5 x 11″ layout with art, detailed descriptions, extra stat blocks, and more! This adventure was created specifically for a holiday celebration at one of our FLGS and written specifically for the Mazes & Perils RPG, but we have ported it to the latest version of the world's favorite RPG, 5e!

223463.name: Insidious Cloaker
223463.description:
From publisher blurb:

If you try on clothing items found in a dungeon, and refuse to examining them closely, you may find a cloaker's eyes staring back at you. Seemingly evolved – or perhaps engineered – to resemble ordinary capes, these creatures wait until adventuring parties get close before unleashing a powerful sonic attack that leaves them disoriented. Some slave-based societies permanently leave their charges among cloakers to keep prisoners tame and submissive.

Yet cloakers can still find ways to surprise experienced parties. The Insidious Cloaker has enhanced its powers to forge a psychic connection with a single target, guiding host as though it were its own body. Only a close examination of the victim's cloak can reveal the eyes which give its presence away.

Many bounties have been placed on rogue spellcasters over the years, only for their hunters to discover an Insidious Cloaker was the culprit – usually after it had switched hosts and escaped.

223464.name: Guide to Vampires
223464.description:
From publisher blurb:

The blood is the life... and it shall be mine!”
The Count is having guests for dinner... and you are invited to join him.

Count Dracula may be the most well known vampire, but he is far from the only bloodsucker to set his appetite on mankind. Learn now of the dark brood that haunts the darkness of night!

This sourcebook is a detailed guide to vampires and other bloodsuckers for the Ubiquity roleplaying system.

Contents include an overview of mankind’s historical interaction with vampires, the nature of vampires and means by which they may be created and destroyed, a list of fearsome powers for customizing vampires, a bestiary of bloodsuckers from around the globe, and a number of unique vampires.

223465.name: Leagues of Gothic Horror Expansion
223465.description:
From publisher blurb:

Evil is a many-faced foe and can strike at any time. Save lives and time by making sure you’re ready to act!

Whether you are a dedicated monster-hunter or drawn toward the occult by happenstance, prepare to delve deeper into the darkness and face the countless horrors that lie in wait!

This sourcebook is a major expansion for the critically acclaimed Leagues of Gothic Horror setting.

Inside you will find more options for player characters, information on gypsies and their evil cousins, the Szgany, a plethora of supernatural sites to explore, more things that go bump in the night, and new unique villains and heroes.

223466.name: Guide to Shapeshifters
223466.description:
From publisher blurb:

Even a man who is pure of heart may become a wolf when the wolfbane blooms and the autumn moon is bright!

Mankind has come far since his ascendancy from apes, but behind the facade of reasoning and civilization he projects he is still an animal.

Deep inside every man lurks a ferocious beast, a terrible creature that can develop a life of its own. This book details those beasts.

The contents of this book include the history of these ferocious beasts, means by which a man might become a shapeshifter, supernatural powers that transform these creatures into truly terrifying foes, statistics for a variety of stock shapeshifters, and a number of unique villains.

223467.name: Drakkar: The card game
223467.description:
Drakkar: The card game is a fast and fun game with a great interaction between players.

In Drakkar, you are the leader of a Viking village that must collect and steal resources such as goats, weapons and golds, to show you are the strongest Viking on the island!
Will you be a Viking worth the favor of the gods?

During each turn, you will use your cards and the ones that you will steal from your rivals to build your ship, hire your warriors and store your beer, ready to sail and pillage!

At the end of the game, each loot card will be worth one victory point regardless of the type (for a Viking a goat, a weapon or a gold have the same value!). Additionally, you will collect one additional point for each trio (goat, weapon, gold).

After three complete rounds, the player who collects the most victory points is the winner!
The game features play for 3-5 players in 20-30 minutes.

223470.name: Alle Kroppe er Grå
223470.description:
From the introduction:

Paris, Year 2032, a world of chaotic splendor.

Europe's largest metroplex, a city without limits.

No one knows how many people live here, but the mixture of peoples, races, and the city's own living pulse produces a strange beauty.

223471.description: A set of plastic replacement tokens for the boss monsters and the movement tokens.
223471.name: Masmorra: Dungeons of Arcadia – Upgraded Token Pack

223472.name: End Days: Atlantis
223472.description:
Description from the publisher:

End Days: Atlantis is a cooperative, dungeon crawler deckbuilding game for 3 players. You have been called upon as champions of New Atlantis to save the city from Armageddon. Lost knowledge capable of redeeming the city is kept in a sacred, ancient tome affixed with multiple seals. Each player assumes the role of 1 of 3 characters with unique classes-- Warrior, Witch, or Wizard. Your quest is to break each seal, which binds the ancient tome, in order to reveal the mystical knowledge and save New Atlantis from catastrophe. But it isn't easy. To break each seal, the party must leave the safety of the city and travel to a dangerous land to vanquish the evil inhabitants within. Only then, can the seals be broken,the book read, and New Atlantis restored.

Games may be played from 1 to 5 seals, each seal taking about an hour each. Each seal contains 5 enemies. When injured by an enemy, players add a wound card to the top of their deck. Each class has a certain number of cards and abilities that must be played each turn, and the party is defeated if any player is forced to play a wound. Special abilities and attacks require charges from crystals, the major Atlantean power source. Loot and experience are awarded after each battle which can be used to upgrade weapons, crystals, and cards within each player's deck. After each seal is completed, the party can return to Atlantis to receive special benefits such as removing all wounds of one color from their deck, trading in loot, and recharging all of their crystals.

223474.name: De Hensynsløse
223474.description:
From the introduction:

A large city. We see a building façade. A passing carriage covers the building's sign. We zoom in on the first floor's large window. Inside there stands a man dressed in a black suit. We pan through the window. He lights a cigar. A knock is heard. "Come in!" says the man and goes to his desk. The large double door opens and six rough-looking cowboys enter and stand in front of the desk. The suit-clad man sits down and gives them a photograph. "This man must die. Fast, simple and brutal. No questions. Here's the first $900. You get the rest when the job is done!" The six men start to go out. "Hey," says the man in the black suit, "For God's sake, do it recklessly!

Dick Smock Film LTD. Production presents a JOST HANSEN film - De Hensynsløse.

... "This year's Western" ... Six cowboys riding at full speed next to each other out on the prairie ... "that will blow you out of the window" ... A stick of dynamite lands by some barrels marked "Powder" ... A bank from the outside ... An explosion ... Windows burst out ... "in a senseless mixture of passion" ... A man rips the clothes off a woman and shoves her onto a bed ... In her clenched fist is a crumpled $5 bill ... "and recklessness" ... A man sitting on a horse, and a boy near a ledge ... "Thanks, kid. But unfortunately we can't use you anymore" ... He kicks the boy off the cliff ...

223475.name: Et Bryllup og Nogle Begravelser
223475.description:
From the introduction:

You are invited to a Royal Wedding in the country Agador. Prince William is to marry the gorgeous Agathe von Hammarskjold, and the king has enthusiastically invited guests from near and far.

However, most significant foreign invitees send apologies as Agador, for them, is nothing but a faraway piece of rough terrain. This leaves the less prominent guests at the grand banquet. Among them, you - the characters.

An adventurous story with room for grand gestures!

223476.name: Hindenburg Auf!
223476.description:
From the introduction:

Friday, May 6, 1937 @ 19:21 the world's largest flying luxury liner Hindenburg exploded. The cause of the explosion, and who might possibly want The Third Reich pride "LZ 129 Hindenburg" destroyed, remains officially a mystery.

Were Luftwaffe intelligence agents aboard the airship? Were Jews aboard the Hindenburg, seeking evidence of Nazi technical ability? Did passengers die because of a political plot?

Who would destroy a purely civilian ship? Were there idealistic, political or personal motives? Or was it just bitter destiny?

223479.name: Nationens Sønner
223479.description:
From the introduction:

Lieutenant Vladislav Mikhailovitj Zhukov watched the runway disappear beneath him and saw, beyond Kabul, the reddish dust of the mountains stretching off to the horizon. They were on their way home, the war for his platoon was over, but a new and important battle was about to begin.

He looked at his people as they sat in their parade uniforms and most of all they seemed like a bunch of schoolboys - if it had not been for the blue beret and blue and white striped telniaska whose collar he just could discern.

In his mind, he recited, again, the Brotherhood's Statute:


Wherever there are mountains of waste,
slavery demands that we light our death torch;
the purifying fire must wash over the land.
Whether we live or die, we are brothers;
our genius will save the world!


At the same time somewhere in the Soviet Union a nuclear reactor exploded - the first little flame of purifying fire.

There was no turning back...

223480.name: Sea of Darkness
223480.description:
A Psychological Horror-Drama

From the introduction:

Rocket Archeron - 2416

When the power supply to the sleep-bed failed, automatic respiration stopped. Without proper ventilation, the thick hibernation liquid entered the mouth and flowed down the throat.

It had a bitter and salty taste...

User summary:

The scenario is distributed as three PDF files:


16-page scenario
18-page print-and-play pre-generated characters
3-page print-and-play handouts

223481.name: Take the Gold
boardgamepodcastepisode: 45 – The Family Gamers Podcast – Tucker Smedes – CardLords
223481.description: Take the Gold is a 2-6 player draw-and-play light bluffing card game that can be learned in under 2 minutes. Players try to be the first to collect 4 gold coins by using Pirates to steal coins from other players. Officers can be called in to stop the pirates, but be prepared for The Kraken who could wipe out everything they have! Games are quick paced and play in less than 10 minutes.

223482.name: Lige Børn Leger Bedst
223482.description:
From the introduction:

".. The Russian president today fired missiles ... uh ... sorry ... today brushed aside the missile program which he undertook last spring. And here at home the Agricultural Board expresses concern about the heat wave that is damaging harvests. And as for sports..."

The police officer turned down the radio, wiped his sweaty brow with his sleeve, and pulled onto Main Street. The headlights cut through the sultry summer night and flashed in the eyes of a cat which lazily prowled the empty street.

Suddenly his headlights silhouetted a dark outline on the road; the officer saw it at the last moment and stopped the car with screeching breaks. He looked up and saw the figure bathed in light, dressed in a fine suit, and standing calmly in the middle of the road. Clearly, it wasn't a local drunk...

223483.name: Uh-oh, Monsters!
223483.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

[This box set includes]:

'Claws and Paws:' The Monsters You'll Meet! This creature book is chock-full of monsters, humans, aliens, robots and tons of other walking, talking, fighting, biting creatures you’ll encounter in Storia. Learn more about the Monster Museum, discover quirks, and learn how to make your own monsters.

Lairs and Scares: Let's Go on Wild Adventures! This adventure book offers three brand-new adventures, all with fun monster themes.

Creature Cards: 30 new creature cards (that match the format of the cards in the original game) for quick-and-easy reference.

Creature Standups: 15 creature standups, letting you bring creatures to life right at the table!

223484.name: Ninja High School the Anime & Manga Role Playing Game (Savage Worlds)
223484.description:
From publisher blurb:

Ninja High School (also known as NHS) is a comic book series created, written, and illustrated by Ben Dunn, and currently published by Antarctic Press. It was at first published by Eternity Comics. On occasion other artists and writers have contributed to the series including Carlos Kastro, Eric Meheu and Fabian Doles. It is currently being developed into a Feature Film by Perfect Circle Productions.

NHS takes place in a suburban town known as Quagmire, located "Somewhere in the Midwest".
